Plugin.Name: Clipboard (64-bit)
Plugin.AuthorInfo: Clipboard Actions Plugin (64-bit) Created by Indigo Rose Corporation Copyright © 2003-2015 Indigo Rose Corporation http://www.indigorose.com
Plugin.ActionXML: <ActionTemplates> <Action> <Name>Clipboard.CopyText</Name> <Description>Copies text to the Windows clipboard.</Description> <ReturnValueType></ReturnValueType> <Arguments> <Arg> <Name>Text</Name> <Description>The text to copy to the clipboard.</Description> <Type>string</Type> <Default/> <Required>1</Required> <EasyMode> <Default>"My Text"</Default> <DataType>string</DataType> <Constraints>none</Constraints> </EasyMode> </Arg> </Arguments> </Action> <Action> <Name>Clipboard.GetText</Name> <Description>Retrieves text from the Windows clipboard.</Description> <ReturnValueType>string</ReturnValueType> <Arguments> </Arguments> </Action> <Action> <Name>Clipboard.IsTextAvailable</Name> <Description>Determines whether text is available on the Windows clipboard.</Description> <ReturnValueType>boolean</ReturnValueType> <Arguments> </Arguments> </Action> </ActionTemplates>
